name: Oboz Arete Low B-Dry Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: Arete Low B-Dry Light Trail Shoes
description: Lightweight and waterproof, the Arete Low B-Dry are designed to handle fast kilometers on the trail. Woven mesh no-sew uppers let your feet breathe while the B-Dry waterproof membrane prevents them from getting wet on muddy trails. The new A3 Chassis supports and stabilizes your foot to keep your secure and upright in variable terrain.Seamless synthetic mesh with abrasion-resistant TPU overlays for durability.Oboz BDry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps rain out and lets sweat escape.O-Fit insole has multi-density EVA pods for comfort and cushion.Single-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support.A3 Chassis™ has TPU stabilizers for torsional rigidity and an ESS forefoot plate for support and underfoot protection.Tempest rubber outsole is lightweight, with multi-directional lugs for traction on loose surfaces.
